attributes.action: Not accept those with drink related 'illnesses' at A & E Departments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many genuinely ill and injured people have to wait and suffer abuse at A&E Departments by those who have deliberately made themselves ill by drinking.  These should be banned from treatment until sober and no longer a danger or nuisance to nursing staff and the public
